body:
I recently added a package for *ada* that `depends_on(r-rpart)`.  I just tried to activate it and it failed.  If I understand what's happening, `rpart` is part of the R core and I should not have added a dependency for it in the package.

Is that correct?  If so I'll update the package.
title: Help with r-ada `depends_on(r_rpart)` but rpart seems to be in the R core.
